drugInteractions.effect: May increase INR with regular use (>2g/day for several days)
drugInteractions.management: Monitor INR if using paracetamol regularly

drugInteractions.effect: Chronic alcohol use increases risk of hepatotoxicity
drugInteractions.management: Use with caution in chronic alcohol users

drugInteractions.effect: Enzyme inducers may increase risk of toxicity
drugInteractions.management: Use lower doses, monitor liver function

overdose.protocol: Most effective if given within 8 hours of ingestion. Can be beneficial up to 24 hours.
overdose.dosing: Loading dose: 150 mg/kg IV over 1 hour, then maintenance doses (consult toxicology protocol)
overdose.signs: Early: Nausea, vomiting, pallor. Late (24-72h): Hepatotoxicity, jaundice, coagulopathy
